descriptionHtml:
[b][font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]This[/size][/font][/b][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4] mod fixes it so that when you conjure a Atronach, it isn't so much weaker than the ones you find as random encounters in the world, and what other NPCs summon, in fact, they are now 100% = in Health, Magicka, and Stamina when you do a regular summon, and one with the "Elemental Potency" perk.

When you use a Atronach Thrall, it will be stronger than the ones NPCs summon, and what you could possibly encounter randomly while exploring, as should be.

Because NPCs don't summon Thralls, and they aren't found in the world neither according to the Skyrim Creation Kit.

You can view all original stats @[/size] [/b][/font][color=#ff0000][size=5]http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Daedra[/size][/color][font=Comic Sans MS][size=4].
[/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff7700][size=4][b]

Flame Atronach Stats[/b][/size]
[/color]
[color=#e69138][b]Flame Atronach - Lvl 5 (Didn't need to change)
Health: 111
Magicka: 174
Stamina: 50
-
Potent Flame Atronach - Lvl 10 (Didn't need to change)
Health: 174
Magicka: 100
Stamina: 86
-
Better Flame Thrall - Lvl 30
Health: 341 (Original 242)
Magicka: 200 (Original 245)
Stamina: 119 (Original 98)
-
Better Potent Flame Thrall - Lvl 35
Health: 382 (Original 358)
Magicka: 225 (Original 270)
Stamina: 128 (Original 157)[/b][/color]
[size=3]----------------------[/size]
[size=3]----------------------[/size]

-

Stamina: 312 ([b]Original [/b]197)
-

Stamina: 328 (Original 313)[/b][/color]
